mapper.select: SELECT CM.M_IDX, CM.H_IDX, CM.CONTENT, CM.TIME, CM.READ, CM.U_ID, U.NAME u_name, U.U_PIC FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM JOIN USER_INFO U ON CM.U_ID = U.U_ID WHERE CM.H_IDX = #{h_idx} ORDER BY M_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(M_IDX), 0) + 1 FROM CHAT_MESSAGE), #{h_idx}, #{content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), '0', #{u_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE (FROM_ID = #{my_id} AND TO_ID = #{target_id}) OR (FROM_ID = #{target_id} AND TO_ID = #{my_id})
